mapper.select: SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM(SELECT productOptionNo, productOptionName, optionValue FROM productOption WHERE categoryNo=#{categoryNo} ORDER BY productOptionNo)B ORDER BY rnum
SELECT MAX(rownum)+1 rnum FROM(SELECT productOptionNo, productOptionName, optionValue FROM productOption WHERE categoryNo=#{categoryNo} ORDER BY productOptionNo)
SELECT c.categoryName, d.categoryDetailName FROM categoryBase c, categoryDetail d WHERE 1=1 AND c.categoryNo = d.categoryNo AND categoryMapNo = #{categoryMapNo}
SELECT categoryMapNo, categoryDetailName, categoryNo FROM categoryDetail WHERE 1=1 AND categoryNo = #{categoryNo}
